content: **knitted pot-holders with nordic pattern snowmen and christmas trees in drops cotton light theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern cluster-125 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 17 x 17 cm **yarn** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 31 pearl grey 50 g colour 01 off white 50 g colour 12 green khaki 50 g colour 20 black + a left-over colour rust 1 pot-holder weighs 50 g **needle** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
